chat.msg: hi there! que comience el juego!!
Hi
hola! i'm at the start with a twig near me leading to an island and a tiger
what's the move buddy?
Go straight to the bird island
alright, going south-west from the tiger, just hit the island with the parrot
where to now?
Pass between the elephant and the bird to the three stones crossing
got it! i've gone past the parrot and elephant and now standing by the 3 rocks
next move?
Pass between the frog and flower and make a U turn then climb on the green alligator
okay, done that
i've just passed between the frog and the butterfly and made the u-turn to the crocodile
You should be on the elehant island now so climb the two stones to the giraffe island
yup, after crossing the crocodile, i've climbed two rocks and now i'm with the giraffe! where to next?
Then head to the snake island and over the snake to claim your treasure
alrighty, just passed the snake island
and guess what? found that bling-bling treasure, woop woop! *finished*
hola, q tal? ready to go?
Yes,, ready to go
cool! alright, head a bit to the left, heading west
spot that wooden bench? you're gonna cross a trail right below it
I have crossed the branch
good job! now, you're gonna do a little twirl i like to call a "u-turn"
whip around 180 degrees to your left and head back over that trail you just crossed
Done
perfect! now, keep moving towards our furry friend, the white dog
ready to go south? just cross over the branch and keep heading down
Done
alrighty! spot the other white dog sitting by a red and white checkered picnic mat? that's where we're heading
just walk over the mat and keep going towards those delicious looking berries. don't actually eat them though!
Done
fantastic! now, head west, but keep an eye out for a wooden branch that crosses a river
you're gonna cross it
Two wooden branches cross the river
nice catch! we're gonna take the second one, heading north across the river
Ok
great, see that pesky green bush? don't bump into it
just go right around it
ok
fab job! as we go, you're gonna see a florist stand
ok
at the florist stand, take a left, heading west, and just keep going until you see a big bridge with some bikers on it
go on, it's a sight!
ok
cool, now, keeping going past that bridge heading west
there's another bench coming up
I dont see another branch heading west
my bad! sorry for the confusion
you're actually looking for a bench with two elderly folks, not a branch. can you see them?
yes
great! head down a little bit, there's a wooden branch and a green bush just south of the old folks
ok
right on! now, make your way east between the branch and the bush
ok
fantastic! just a couple steps more to the east and you're done
look out for a young, brown deer. is it there?
yes
ship ahoy! congrats on reaching the end of our little adventure
you did an awesome job!
hey there, estas listo?
Hi
cool! i'm at the tent
where should i head next?
Pass in front of the dog
alright, just walked past the dog
now i'm next to the fire. what's next, buddy?
Then pass between the dog and the fire
oki doki, i managed to maneuver between the dog and the fire
now i'm closer to the red mushroom. where to now, pal?
Then pass between the fire and the mushroom
done and done, slipped between the fire and the mushroom, heading south
now i see a blue car. what's the move?
Head towards the blue car but do not touch the car
roger! walked towards the blue car, didn't touch it
Now make a U-turn along the path and head towards the touch. Ps: Do not touch the grasses
you got it! made the u-turn, heading again north towards the tent but i'm careful not to touch the grass
where to now?
No donot head towards the tent. I said head towards the telescope
whoops! my bad, turning around and setting course for the blue telescope
Pass in front of the telescope and the small tree in front of it
sure thing! just passed in front of the telescope and the small tree ahead of it
Go along the path and head to the house
yep, going along the path and making my way to the house
*finished*! we made it, thanks for the guidance!
hey, q tal? empezamos el juego?
What to do?
alright, let's start! first up, head towards the south-west, under the nearest palm tree, hang a right past it and then swerve left before you hit the third tree
continue south, buddy!
Now heading towards the dog
perfect! now curve a little to the left and then whip to the right, southbound
make sure to give that cute brown puppy some space!
done
great! now steer your way between that big rock on your left and the tiny one on your right
head straight down towards the ocean
done
awesome! now you're gonna need to dip your toes into the water and give a friendly wave to the big red crab
then take a quick right and glide along the big rock, keep heading west in the water
I dont understand you instruction
sorry if my last message was unclear. you need to turn right in the water and move along the side of the big rock, keeping it to your left
keep headed westward. you got this!
Done
top-notch job! now, just go past this medium rock
up ahead a shark's waiting for you, so be brave and make a sharp right turn
I am in front of the crab, should I head towards the shark?
yep! as soon as you see that shark, make a daring turn to the right
you're doing great!
done
perfect! now get back to the dry land, squeeze between the medium rock and this funky blue-yellow-white ball and then go north again
done
groovy! now take a slight detour to the left, scooting left to the north-west, keep the red tent on your left and the loud speaker on your right
done
aren't you just smashing this game! curve around that tent in an arc and head southwards again towards the sea
done
epic job! but hang on, we're not hopping into the water this time! just as you're about to hit the shore, go right and head west under that red kayak
can you see it?
that is not right, the kayak is by my left
my bad, you're right! from your current position, you need to turn to your left to get under the kayak
keep going along it in a northward direction. you're so close!
done
outstanding! now just head north along the kayak until you eventually meet a little green bush
you're done! high five for that incredible navigation skills! what awaits you there? only time will tell

general_survey.question: Have you ever lived in a home environment or country where your second language was spoken? If so, please explain briefly:
Do you speak any additional languages? If so, please describe briefly here.

How likely would you be to mix languages in the following contexts? At home
How likely would you be to mix languages in the following contexts? Interacting with friends
How likely would you be to mix languages in the following contexts? Interacting with family
How likely would you be to mix languages in the following contexts? Using social media
When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? To accommodate people who don't share the same language or language fluency.
When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? For social reasons; one language feels more appropriate.
When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? I can't think of a word in the current language.
When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? The word in the other language just fits better.
When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? It's an accident, or I don't realize I'm doing it.
When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? I'm more comfortable discussing the topic in the other language.

general_survey.answer: I think my partner is pretty good at language switching.

Any final comments about your language background?
